mapper.update:
update tab_device
device_no = #{deviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
plate_number = #{plateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sell_type_id = #{sellTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
coach_id = #{coachId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
device_type_id = #{deviceTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sim_card = #{simCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
charge_type_id = #{chargeTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
deposit = #{deposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_login_ip = #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
test_status = #{testStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
test_coach_id = #{testCoachId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
test_student_id = #{testStudentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
free_time = #{freeTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_test_time = #{totalTestTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_test_income = #{totalTestIncome,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
total_test_pay = #{totalTestPay,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tab_device set device_no = #{deviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plate_number = #{plateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sell_type_id = #{sellTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, coach_id = #{coachId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, device_type_id = #{deviceTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sim_card = #{simCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, charge_type_id = #{chargeTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deposit = #{deposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_login_ip = #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, test_status = #{testStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, test_coach_id = #{testCoachId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, test_student_id = #{testStudentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, free_time = #{freeTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} total_test_time = #{totalTestTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} total_test_income = #{totalTestIncome,jdbcType=DECIMAL} total_test_pay = #{totalTestPay,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
